Room.Name: Ashton River Road/Phexton Bridge
Room.ShortDescription: The bridge across the gorge is old, but wide enough for a couple of carts.
Room.LongDescription: A small footpath leads down into the canyon below the bridge, but it soon disappears out of sight and you cannot see where it goes. A spectacular waterfalls is at the eastern end of the gorge and a plume of fine mist is everywhere. The falls is much higher than the road at this point of your journey. the road drops considerably to the west.
